Class IMServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • IMServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMConnectable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class IMServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMConnectable, java.lang.Runnable
    Represents an IM server object.
